Your role is simple - try to survive. Each day, you will have a chance to lynch the werewolf.
You are the Seer. Each night, you may choose a player, and have their role revealed to you. Admit to your role wisely: If you reveal you are the seer, the wolves will try to kill you!

You get to have fun! Each day, you will attempt to deceive your fellow players. However, each night, you will get to pick a player to kill!\nNote: If you attack the cursed, they will become a wolf like yourself! Hooray friends!\nIf you attack the drunk, you yourself will become drunk, and will be unable to do the next attack as you sleep off your hangover! (Usually, this means you can't attack the following night, but if the Wolf Cub was killed and the Drunk was your first choice, you won't be able to kill the second player, and you will still be able to attack the following night.)

As the harlot (you slut...) you will be given the chance to 'visit' another player each night. If they are not the wolf, you will be told so (because you live!). If you visit a wolf, you will be killed. If you visit the player the wolves have chosen to kill, you will be killed as well. However - If you are visiting a player, and the wolves choose to kill you, you will survive (you weren't home)
You drunken bastard! As the drunk, you are still just a villager. BUT! If the wolves kill you, they will become disabled for the next kill, as they are drunk off your insanely high BAC.
As the cursed, you are a normal villager... until the wolves kill you. Once they do, you will become a wolf as well! Free to hunt in the night... XD
You are a traitorous bastard. If you survive long enough for all the wolves to die, you will become a werewolf, ready to kill your former teammates in the night!
You are the Guardian Angel! Each night, you may choose a player to watch over. Be careful however - if you choose to watch over a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will be killed.
You old sleuth. Each day, you will have the chance to investigate another player. Use this carefully however, for these is a 40% chance the werewolves will detect you!

A bit trigger happy are we? As the gunner, you are given 2 silver bullets at the beginning of the game. Each day, you will have the chance to shoot another player. Once you do, everyone will know you are the gunner! Be careful though, you only have 2 bullets!
The Tanners goal is simple: Get Lynched. If the Tanner gets lynched, he wins, period. Everyone else loses.
he fool is told they are the seer.... when they choose to see someone's role at night, they are told a random role.
As a cultist, it is your goal to convert all other players (except wolves) to your cult. If at the end of the game, all living players are cultist - the cult wins
Your job is to hunt the Cult. If the cult attacks you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to 'hunt' - if they are a cultist, they will die.
At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your 'role model'. If they die, you become a werewolf.
For now, you are a normal villager. However, if the seer dies, you will become the new seer
You will be told who the seer is (the real one, not the fool)
A mason's job is simple - they automatically know who the other masons are. Otherwise, they are a simple villager.

Your ancestors had the ability to metamorph into others... while you don't have their full abilities, you can pick a player at the start of the game. If that player dies, you will become what they were. Note: If the player was converted to cult, you will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were Wild Child and their role model died, you will become a wolf. Otherwise, you will inherit their role model. The cult cannot convert the Doppelgänger (but can after the doppelganger switches roles). Also - the Doppelgänger can NOT win unless they have transformed. If at the end of the game, the Doppelgänger is still the same, they lose (exception: lover)

Love is in the air. As Cupid, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (villager + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (villager) wins as well. TL;DR if at least one of the lovers was on the winning team, they both win together.

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. Note: For wolf attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one wolf, the hunter has a 30% chance to kill the wolf (and survive). For each additional wolf, add 20% (2 wolves = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple wolves, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!

That asylum was silly anyways. What a joke. You are free now however, back to business as usual - killing! The serial killer is a lone player, on their own team. They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the serial killer, you can kill ANYONE - wolves, hunters, gunners, guardian angels, whatever. If the wolves try to attack you, you will kill one of them (random), and live.
Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with werewolves too long....Messing with werewolves is a very bad idea.

As mayor, you are a lowly villager, until you reveal yourself. Then you are given twice the vote count for lynching (meaning that your vote is twice as powerful as everyone else's). Use that power wisely to help the Village Team.

The prince is a key role in the Village Team's strategy. Once the prince gets lynched, their role as Prince is revealed, and they survive. However, this can only happen once: if the village insists on lynching them, they will die.
Do you remember the good old seer? Well now, it has its Wolf Team counterpart. The sorcerer is the Wuff's Seer. They can only see if someone is Wolf or Seer, and they win with the Wolves.

You are the Clumsy Guy. Maybe you should not have had so much alcohol for breakfast. You can't see a damn thing. Can you even vote for the person you want to? (You have a 50% chance to vote for someone random.)

You are the BlackSmith. Through the years, no blades nor swords gave you as much satisfaction as the Silver Blades the elves ordered.\nYou might have some silverdust left. Who knows ? It might *prevent Wolves from eating tonight* 🤔
You are the Alpha Wolf, the origin of the curse, the bane of banes. Every night, there's 20% chance that you will bite your pack's meal, and they will join your ranks instead of dying!

What a cuuuute little wuff. _tickles tickles_ -cough cough- As i was saying, you are the Wolf Cub and you _drops the mic_ -I just can't resist that. I think if anyone killed you, I'd give the wuffs two victims. You're too cute to die. I wouldn't be able to tickle you anymore-
You are a lowly villager, but since you spend most of your time in the woods where there are real wolves, the Seer will get confused and think you are a werewolf! Oh no....
The lycan is a wolf, but will appear to be a villager to the seer
The oracle will be told what role someone is NOT, choosing from roles that are still alive in the game
Once per game, the sandman can make all players sleep so deeply that nobody can use their night actions
The Pacifist can choose to convince everyone in your village not to lynch anyone. This can only be done once.

The Wise Elder 📚 can survive a werewolf attack once - the second time they can eat you up. If the Gunner or Hunter kill you with their abilities, they will lose their powers out of sorrow and will be converted to a normal villager.

By default, the Thief 😈 can steal a player's role on the first night and turn that player into a villager.\nIf the [Full Thief] mode is turned on, they get 50% chance to steal a player's role every night, if successful, that player will become the new thief and continues with the theft!
The Troublemaker is the raging teenager in town. When they start yelling, the whole village gets out of control. To gain silence, they will lynch twice that day!

The chemist is a quite crazy person who likes to brew potions and mess up with them. They mix two potions and force other people to choose one to drink, while the chemist will drink the other. However, while one solution is just tasting like rosebuds, the other one is going to kill you instantly. Good luck when they visit you!

The Snow Wolf 🐺☃️ is an wolf that was native to the snowcapped mountains near the village. As such, they have mastered the art of controlling ice and snow. Having lived alone for a long time, the Snow Wolf prefers to operate alone. Instead of hunting with their pack at night, they can pick a separate victim to freeze, which causes them to be unable to use their night actions. However, they will still have some residue of the Snow Wolf's magic the next night, causing them to be immune to the Snow Wolf for one night.

You are the Grave Digger ☠️. Every night, you dig the graves for all the people who died since the last time you did (yes, even werewolves deserve a proper burial). Since you are out all night, wolves and the cult can't find you, unless you actually have nothing to do (i.e. no one died), in that case you'll just stay home. Everyone who visits you has a chance of falling into your newly dug graves, depending on how many graves you dug. Also, the chance is halved for everyone who is on the village team with you. But since you are out at night, the wolves or the serial killer might spot and kill you, and the more graves you have to dig, the more likely it is. Also, apparently the serial killer can find you whether you're at home or not, but he might at least stumble in one of your graves and hurt his leg, causing him to maybe lose control over who is his victim the next night...

You are the arsonist. Like the serial killer, you are alone on your team. Every night, you may douse one targets house with kerosene. Once one or more houses are doused, you may choose to spark instead, burning all doused houses and killing everyone that is inside, including potential visitors. You win if you're the only one left.

You are the Augur 🦅. Every morning, you watch the birds and deduce a role that certainly is not in the game right now from their flight. They also will never tell you a role twice, so be sure you make use of that information!
Ran away
💀 Dead
👹 Alive
Monsters Alive
Won
Lost

Which roles would you like to use in the game?

Configuration Tutorial:

✅ = Role enabled
❌ = Role disabled

After selecting the roles, you need to use the VALIDATE button in the bottom left corner to validate and enable your role selection! If you don't validate your selection, it will be ignored and all roles will be used!

If you disable too many roles, the bot will be unable to create a balanced game and the validation will fail! In that case, just enable more roles and validate again.

If the validation succeeded, the bottom left button says ✅ Valid ✅ and your role configuration will be used!
Enable All
Disable All
‼ Validate ‼
✅ Valid ✅
The role configuration is valid! It's enabled and will be used now!
The role configuration is invalid! Please try turning on more roles to allow the bot to create balanced games!

You are the Infected Human 😾 You are a human infected by the Alpha Wolf but for some unknown reasons you didn't turn into a werewolf, you are so strong! If the werewolves attack you another time the infection in your blood will react and you will finally turn into a werewolf.

You are the Warlock 🕵! You used to be a part of Halloween Town's only coven, but some disagreements happened and they asked to leave... You can still use the soul-searching spells you learned in your former coven, just... not at the same time. The witches sleep during the day, so that's the time you can use your spells to find out exactly what kind of monster another person is! Be careful whenever the sun is out-- the walls have ears, and werewolves' heightened hearing may notice you preparing your spells!
You are the Clurichaun 🍻! You are the alcohol-loving cousin of the Leprechaun. Your strong love for drinking gave you tendencies to haunt breweries, pubs and wine cellars.

You are the Fairy 👼. You help the children sleep well at night and prevent them from getting nightmares. During the night, you usually go to a monster's house because you want to make sure that they are sleeping soundly.

You are the Centaur 🔫. You lived for many years in the woods so you learned how to use the ark. In Halloween Town they allowed you to keep two arrows with you, so if something happens with other monsters you can use those arrows to defend yourself.

You are the Succubus 💋! Every night, you go to someone's den and feed on their energy... which sounds wonderful. But it won't be if the monster you choose to feed on isn't very open to visitors. Still, a girl's gotta eat, right?

You are the Faceless 🖕! You're the faceless guy in town and you aren’t a good person but for now you will stay in the good team. It is your lifelong dream to become a werewolf but you can’t do it if other wolves are alive because they won’t accept you. You will have to wait until all wolves have died to replace them and steal their face.

You are a Werewolf 🐺! Back in the day you lived peacefully with the other monsters at Halloween Town, but something happened a while ago that made werewolves become violent and stronger... Strong enough that each night, you can choose a den to attack and can possibly kill the monster living there!

You are the Witch 👳! The head of Halloween Town's coven, you are the only one that has enough power to use soul-searching spells. Those spells take time, so you will only be able to search the soul of one monster each night to find out what they are!
You are a Ghost 👱. Scaring people in the Halloween Town is your specialty. You would turn yourself into a human and confuse everyone.

You are the Clown 👺. You are annoying and your jokes aren't funny. You tried killing yourself but you got too scared. Monsters hate you and you want to make them hate you more hoping that they will kill you sooner or later. If you die by lynching, you will automatically win the game!

You are a Cerberus 👶! You are a guardian in this town and you have to choose a monster to protect. If the one you chose to protect dies, you will be so angry and nobody will be able to stop you. Because of this you will turn into an evil werewolf. You are like Lucifer, from Angel to Devil.
You are the Black Cat 👁, and witches are known for having one as their familiar. If there is a Witch in this town, you will be its personal pet and you will know their identity.
You are the Little Witch 🙇. You are the witch's sister and for now you don't have many powers and can't do many things either. If your sister dies, their powers will be passed down to you.

You are a Vampire 👤. Every night, you and your clan can choose one person to attack... Not that you'll kill them! Your clan has a strict no-killing rule, so the most you have ever done to your victim was drink their blood... And, well... if that turns them into vampires, who are you to complain? The more the merrier!

You are the Vampire Slayer 💂, trying to stop the vampires in town from converting everyone! Each night, you get to choose a player. If they are a vampire, they will die. If the vampires try to visit you, the vampire's newest member dies.
You are a Gnome 👷. You and your buddies love staying together and create useful resources that the town needs. You know who your mates are.

You are the Mermaid 🏹. You are forced to live in a bath tub in Halloween Town. This made you a little depressed and singing helps you forget your situation. Monsters love your voice and through this, you can make them fall deeply in love with another monster.

You are a Shapeshifter 🎭! Unfortunately, too many pranks have left you with a strict rule: no shifting into someone from the Town! Still, they didn't say anything about shifting into dead people... With all those attacks going around, today will be your last chance to choose someone to shift into once they die!
You are the Ork 🎯. You are a creature that loves war so much that you always bring your hammer with you. If the wolves attack you, you may be able to throw the hammer at them causing them to die.
You are Samael 🔪. You are the Old Evil Spirit who escaped from Sarcophagus. Now you are desperate and hungry for souls and everyone you touch dies by your hands.

You are the Hydra 🎖, a serpentine water monster who holds multiple heads, more than any other monsters around. Because of the great amount of knowledge you possess within all your heads, your vote counts twice once you have revealed your identity to the monsters of Halloween Town.
You are the Scarecrow 👑! A resident monster of Halloween Town with a peculiar appearance that will freak all the monsters out the first time they try to lynch you. Those fools...

You are a Zombie 🤕, a monster who has been brought back to life through a special poison. Although alive, your moves are really slow and clumsy, which leads you to just cast your votes with just 50% accuracy.

You're the Wizard 🔮! You were one of the most powerful Magicians during the Academy Period but due to your bad attendance and, mostly, your continuous use of forbidden Dark Magic, they kicked you out! Full of hatred towards the other foolish monsters, you offer your magic powers to the werewolves! At night you'll use your magic powers to find the werewolves or the Witch (the monster that's your bitter enemy). Enjoy helping snuff out those miserable monsters.

You are a Unicorn ⚒, a legendary and majestic creature who owns a magic spiraling horn projecting from your forehead. The magic that your horn possesses can be spread a given day, letting you repel werewolves’ action for the upcoming night.

You are the Alpha Wolf ⚡️, the source of the scourge. Your bite is the cause of the curse that turns monsters into werewolves. Each night, you will choose a monster to attack whom you may kill or infect. As long as you are alive, your pack's victim has a 20% chance of turning into a werewolf.

You are the Wolf Cub 🐶, adored by your wolf pack. adored by your wolf pack. Like other wolves, you will choose a den to attack and probably kill the monster residing in it every night. If you happen to be killed, your wolf pack will fly into an even more violent rage and attack two monsters the next night. You’ll still be dead though.

You are the Bigfoot 👱🌚. A very very very hairy monster, just like the werewolves. The main thing that makes you different from them is that you are not a carnivore. However, due to the same style of walking and same hair style, the witch may be confused and think that you are a werewolf. Oh no...

You are the Chupacabra 🐺🌝! Since you don't have fur, you look like a normal ghost and nobody will recognize you. You have anger management issues and these resurface every night causing you to eat other monsters together with the werewolves.

You are the Nymph 🌀. You are a mystical creature that lives in the lake and through your powers, you can see the essence of the heart of the monsters. Through this, you will know which monsters are NOT. Take note that your powers can only see the monsters currently alive in the game.
You are the Slenderman 💤! You don't go out frequently but when you do, you always scream so loud that other monsters will be terrified and will won't go out for the night!

You are the Spirit ☮️. The difference between a spirit and a ghost is that you have a conscience; you think and make decisions. In your past life, you were unjustly killed so you already know how death feels. You don't want other monsters to go through the same thing and you have the power to stop monsters from one day of lynching.
You are the Phoenix 📚! Legends say that the Phoenix never dies, well, that's a legend for a reason. But at least you will be able to rise from your ashes for one time if wolves decide to attack you.

You are the Goblin 😈! An ugly green creature that only loves to steal things just for the fun of it. In this Halloween Town, you love to steal the identity and the soul of other players. When you do it, the monster whom you stole from will become a ghost.

You are the Goblin 😈! An ugly green creature that only loves to steal things just for the fun of it. In this Halloween Town, you love to steal the identity and the soul of other players. Other monsters know that you are a good thief so they won't let you steal their identities easily and you will have to deceive them and convince them to swap your roles. Not all monsters are stupid so you will have a 50% chance to convince them.

You are the Prankster 🤯, a mischievous young monster who loves messing with the decorations that the monsters put up for halloween. To stop the prankster from playing around and to regain peace within this chaotic festivity, the monsters will lynch twice that day!

You are Frankenstein 👨‍🔬! You are a crazy scientist who loves making poisonous potions for monsters. Every other night you can visit a monster to give them a potion, which, of course, drops them dead instantly. But NOT ALL monsters are stupid, some of them could reject your suspicious drink and force you to drink it instead, in which case, you die.

You are Fenrir 🐺☃️. You are an independent mythological wolf who shuts itself up a mountain where you finds solace in snow, away from all the other wolves in the pack. Over time, you have attained the power of controlling ice and snow which gave you the ability to freeze other monsters every night, causing them to be unable to use their night actions, if they have any. However, the power of snow comes with a price which forbids you to freeze the same victim two nights in a row.

You are the Mummy ☠️. You died millions of years ago and scientists studied your body for countless of years. Through your willpower, you woke yourself up and fled from the laboratory, now residing in Halloween Town. There you mummify dead monsters, hoping that in a remote future they will wake up just like you did. There is just a slight problem with your work: you are really clumsy, you always lose some of the bandages covering you up and other monsters could slide on them and get hurt or fall directly into an empty sarcophagus. Oops...

You are a Dragon 🔥. The last great dragon of your species. As the lone mythical monster that you are, you despise seeing all the other monsters happy with companions. Because of this, you developed a sadistic manner of enjoying hearing desperate cries of help of the monsters you incinerate. In order to do so, each night you choose a monster’s den you would like to ignite the following night, spilling a drop of your saliva on their rooftop. When you decide to ignite the fire, you roar out of your lungs and the fire follows your commands and burns everything to crisp within the monsters’ den, including night visitors.
You are the Hippogriff 🦅. A legendary creature who uses its majestic wings and perfect eyesight to fly over Halloween Town every night and spot which monster are NOT part of the town at that time.

What a good meal you had tonight! {0} was full of energy when the night started, although now they're in a rather bad shape...

What a wonderful night you had! Although you won't tell it to anyone, your dreams were very pleasurable, and you will remember them for a very long time... And if you're feeling worse for the wear once the morning comes, it's a small price to pay for that great night.

Your heightened hearing could catch some incantations being muttered in a den somewhere... Discreetly looking around, you realize the source of the sound is {0}'s den. Looks like you've caught the Warlock 🕵!
After lots of preparing and a very tiring enchantment, your spell finally reveals {0}'s soul, that of {1}!

The first thing you realized was a prickle in your neck, then another, then another... At the end of the night, you didn't even feel the blood loss anymore, and the vampire clan accepted you as one of their own.

When morning comes, everyone had expected to see their beloved Unicorn strolling around town as part of its daily routine, but all they found was the mangled body of {0}, the Unicorn lying in a pool of its own blood with its head missing. The vampire clan ran into unexpected trouble last night. Their newest member had the misfortune of visiting a wolf on the night the wolves decided to stay in their dens, and the wolf found {0} quite delicious. Unfortunately for {0}, wolves have no interest in joining their sparkly clan.

{0} the fairy happily flying to their next house to guard from horrible nightmare. Only to found the monster standing in front of them is a nightmare in real life form. Left was a note, "What a brave act to protect when you are horribly weak."

{0} tried to guard a wolf last night. The town woke up to find only the wings of {0} hung on the spookiest monument in Halloween Town. Clearly the wolves had an extra sparkly meal, free-of-remorse, to their dens.

Knowing only {0} was left, {1} tries to eat {0} up, but {0}'s love for war, battle and their paranoia proves too much to handle! All there is left is a hammer embedded in {1}'s face and the last monster standing: the victorious ork for Halloween Town!

Knowing only {0} was left, {1} chose a time where {0}'s guard was at their lowest. Eliminating the final monster of Halloween Town proved to be effortless for {1}, for all there remains is the mutilated body of {0}, the ork, adorned with parallel slashes to the face.

{1} and {0} walk out in daylight. Seeing a drop of blood slowly dripping down {0}'s neck, the righteous {1} draws their sword for the final time, putting an end to the twisted learnings of the vampire clan that have contaminated Halloween Town.

As Halloween Town begins to lynch {0}, the fading light of the sun setting into the horizon lands on {0}’s face, revealing one of the most fearsome and spooky facies anyone has ever seen. Feeling terrified, the monsters of Halloween Town sheepishly retire for the night.

The pack heads to the den of {0}, just to find that they are not home. All you can see is a candle shining lonely near the tombs...
The pack heads to the den of {0}, but on the way there, {1} suddenly steps into a bandage left lying on the floor, falls into an open sarcophagus and gets impaled by a silver spear!
As you just want to close the sarcophagus you were preparing all night, you notice a foul stench, different from the usual smell of dead bodies... The wolf {0} fell into the sarcophagus and died!
You sucked the life out of {0}'s body, but on your way back you leaned too far over an unfinished sarcophagus and stumbled into it. Now your leg really hurts.
On your way to the den of {0}, a sharp pain surges through your leg. You decided to just go to the nearest den, which appears to be {1}'s, you sucked the life out of them and hurried home.
You arrive at {0}'s house, just to see the fairy standing in front of it! You try to fight, but you stand no chance. Tonight was a really bad night for you...

Another night without being able to slay one of those bloody vampires! Frustrated, you took a shortcut near the tombs without noticing the loose bandages scattered on the floor until you slip on it. You scream and struggle, but it's too late. You fall backwards into a sarcophagus that {0} left open and the sound of your neck breaking is the last thing you hear before everything goes black.

After another tiring night, you walk back to your home with the sun already rising. Just before you arrive, you notice a sword lying on the ground next to an unfinished sarcophagus. Inside that, you see the dead body of {0}. The vampire slayer should have not suspected you...

You return from another tiring night, when suddenly you hear a scream from one of your unfinished sarcophagus! You hurry there, just to find {0} lying dead. What kind of vampire tries to drink the blood of a bloodless mummy, anyway?

On your way to {1}'s den, {0} suddenly decides that it would be a good idea to burn down the church as well. They lead you near the tombstones when they suddenly slip on scattered bandages all over the floor! All you can hear is their scream before they fall into a sarcophagus and you run for your lives.

As you are on your way to {0}'s den, you try to remember which suitcase compartment you put your poisonous potion in. Then you suddenly stumble, falling into an open sarcophagus where a silver spear pierces right through your heart. Before you can make a sound, you are dead.

"I could use a glass of wine now", you think to yourself. A strange feeling lets you look into a tomb next to you, and as if fate heard your wish, a bottle of wine lies inside! Too bad there's also {0}'s dead body... Suddenly, you lost all your appetite.

You put your favorite red lipstick on and head to {0}'s house to have a little fun. Sadly, you don't get far enough, as you slip on scattered bandages and fall into a sarcophagus on the way... Talk about occupational risk!

Apparently fate doesn't want you to have fun... Not only that you have to mummify dead monsters all night, you even find {0}, the succubus, dead in one of your unfinished sarcophagus. No fun for you tonight!
You wander to {0}'s house, carefully avoiding all the open sarcophagus, but when you arrive, their den is empty... Apparently {0} is out all night mummifying dead bodies again!

Fortune surely didn't favor you tonight... You just wanted to watch over {0} to make sure they aren't having any nightmares, but instead you fell into an open sarcophagus after slipping on scattered bandages and died! Why does the mummy leave them open?

On your way home, you notice a wand lying on the ground... You don't have to search long to find {0}, the fairy, lying dead inside a sarcophagus! Sometimes your "unorganized self" really go off on the wrong people.

You sneak through the tombstones on your way to deceive {0} into exchanging identities, but you're too focused on not making a sound to notice the bandages lying around! Not enough that your stealth is surely broken, you even fall into the sarcophagus next to you and break your neck!

Good thing you forgot to clean up the scattered bandages near the tombstones last night... {0} tried to sneak in to deceive you into exchanging identities with them, but they slipped on scattered bandages and fell into a sarcophagus! Maybe now the village will believe you that your clumsiness is sometimes helpful.
You should watch your step when you go dropping your flammable saliva into someone's den next time... You slipped on bandages, fell into a sarcophagus and got a silver spear right through your heart!
You notice a bad smell of saliva in your house. Alarmed, you hurry to take a look and find {0}, the dragon, lying dead inside a sarcophagus. At least your den wasn't burned...

That's strange... You thought it was just dark but you weren't able to find {0} when it was time to discuss which den you want to attack tonight. Where are they and what happened to them?

You're just trying to do your job, when suddenly Samael touches you! You are dead, again, this time you don't have a soul...
You're just trying to do your job, when suddenly a wolf jumps onto you from behind and kills you!

{0} opens their eyes, but instead of hearing the usual bustle of the Town, they are met with silence. They stare at the dreary ceiling letting reality slowly sink in. Everyone was dead. The wolves were dead. With a pang in their heart, {0} gets up, and packs their things, before walking to the edge of the village. A tear slips from their eye, as {0} recalls how close they and their wolves were to victory. Alas, it was time to start a new life, with a new pack. {0} slips into the darkness of the forest, away from the quiet Town.
As every monster heads home, they barely make it to their beds from exhaustion. They all fall asleep so strongly, they don't even remember going to sleep...

The Spirit ☮️, {0}, used their powers to persuade everyone that allowing another monster to die isn't just. All the monsters in Halloween Town suddenly felt the same for no reason at all, but they were satisfied 😌. There will be no lynching today!
